know: Bilim is an online platform designed to help you to learn English comfortably.
headeText: Student Union is an learning centre designed to help you to learn several courses comfortably to achieve success in your life.

aboutBlock.title: Comfy environment
aboutBlock.desc: You can schedule your own timetable and how long you would like to study
aboutBlock.descTwo: Our teachers are highly qualified and have many years of experience with working with children as well with adults
aboutBlock.descThree: You don’t have to worry about your timetable. Our teachers will design a right plan for you.

learn.title: Learn english with us starting from today
learn.one: You can check our free lesson with our teachers or you can pay for the the course with a discount and start learning
learn.two: Once your level checked up you can start your lessons with us. Our teachers then will plan appropriate methods to run the lessons.
learn.three: Once the classes likes, start your learning journey with us!!!

why.title: Why Bilim
why.cardDesc: You can schedule your own timetable and how long you would like to study
why.cardDescTwo: Our teachers are highly qualified and have many years of experience with working with children as well with adults
why.cardDescThree: You don’t have to worry about your timetable. Our teachers will design a right plan for you.

coursesList.title: Our Courses
coursesList.desc: corresponds to basic users of English who can understand and very basic phrases.

pupils.title: Reviews
pupils.oneDesc: Teachers don't just teach - they prepare us for the future. We appreciate your actions.
pupils.two: Your dedication will not go unnoticed.
pupils.twoDesc: It is very useful for teachers to assess our knowledge, to prepare lessons and attend conferences based on personal and family circumstances
pupils.threeDesc: I am proud that I can study all the subjects I need in one place.
pupils.fourDesc: I like the conditions, especially the interactive whiteboards and the design of the rooms is very modern. 5. I didn't know anything when I arrived, I learned a lot after the lessons of qualified teachers, thank you.
pupils.five: I didn't know anything when I arrived
pupils.fiveDesc: I learned a lot after the lessons of qualified teachers, thank you.
pupils.sixDesc: I want to come to my classes every day because your teaching method is easy.
